trans-unit.source: There is no user registered with the this email
trans-unit.target: Nema korisnika registriranog sa ovim e-mailom

trans-unit.source: Day, month and year are mandatory fields
trans-unit.target: Dan, mjesec i godina su obavezna polja
Korisničko ime "%value%" se ne može koristiti

trans-unit.source: The username "%value%" contains characters that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime "%value%" sadrži znakove koji nisu dozvoljeni

trans-unit.source: Username must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime mora imati najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: Username cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: Invalid email – your email is not in the correct format
trans-unit.target: Neispravan e-mail - tvoj e-mail nije u ispravnom formatu

trans-unit.source: "%value%" is too short. The username should be at least 3 characters.
trans-unit.target: "%value%" je prekratko. Korisničko ime mora imati najmanje 3 znaka.

trans-unit.source: Your password should be at least %min_length% characters long
trans-unit.target: Tvoja lozinka mora biti duga najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: Your password cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Tvoja lozinka ne može biti duža od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: We will send the new password, to the email address you provided during registration
trans-unit.target: Poslaćemo ti novu lozinku na e-mail koji je korišten tokom registracije

trans-unit.source: This email address has already been registered by another user
This username is already in use
trans-unit.target: Ovo korisničko ime je već u upotrebi

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Please start typing the name of your home location and select from the list.
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje je obavezno. Počni kucati naziv svog grada i odaberi ga sa spiska.

trans-unit.source: You have entered the text incorrectly. Please try again.
You must select a file to upload
The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Fajl koji si poslao nije u ispravnom formatu. Možeš postaviti JPG, GIF ili PNG fajlove slika.

trans-unit.source: The file you submitted is not in a valid format. Please upload a JPG, GIF or PNG image file.
trans-unit.target: Fajl koji si poslao nije u ispravnom formatu. Možeš postaviti JPG, GIF ili PNG fajlove slika.

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 4MB. Please reduce file size before submitting again.
trans-unit.target: Ograničenje veličine fajla je 4MB. Smanji veličinu fajla prije slanja.

trans-unit.source: File size limit is 2MB.Please reduce file size.
trans-unit.target: Ograničenje veličine fajla je 2MB. Smanji veličinu fajla.

trans-unit.source: Caption must contain at least %min_length% characters
The caption cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Naslov ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters. Shorten your review.
trans-unit.target: Preporuka ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova. Skrati svoju preporuku.

trans-unit.source: The review must contain at least %min_length% characters
The review contains characters that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Preporuka sadrži znakove koji nisu dozvoljeni

trans-unit.target: Preporuka sadrži riječi koje nisu dozvoljene

trans-unit.source: The answer cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Odgovor ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova

The review cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Preporuka ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: the answer contains words that are not allowed
trans-unit.target: Odgovor sadrži riječi koje nisu dozvoljene

trans-unit.source: The caption must contain at least 3 characters
The caption cannot contain more than 255 characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov ne može imati više od 255 znakova

trans-unit.source: This field is mandatory. Select your town/city from the dropdown list.
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje je obavezno. Odaberi svoj grad iz padajuće liste.

trans-unit.source: This field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: You must select Street and/or Nighbourhood
You must enter Street and/or Nighbourhood
You must enter Street Number and/or Entrance
You need to register a business account in order to manage you company's listing in getlokal.ro
trans-unit.target: Moraš registrirati poslovni nalog kako bi uređivao podatke firme na getlokal.ro

trans-unit.source: Log out of your user profile and register as a business
trans-unit.target: Odjavi se sa svog korisničkog profila i registriraj poslovni profil

trans-unit.source: Only business users can claim companies!
trans-unit.target: Samo poslovni korisnici mogu imati vlasništvo firme

trans-unit.source: Enter the URL of Your Blog
The field cannot contain more than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Polje ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: The field must contain at least %min_length% characters
This field is not mandatory but if you fill it in it must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje nije obavezno ali ako ga popuniš mora imati najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: This field is not mandatory but if you fill it in itcannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Ovo polje nije obavezno ali ako ga popuniš ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem changing your password. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Desio se problem pri promjeni lozinke. Pokušaj ponovno kasnije.

trans-unit.source: The start date cannot be earlier than today
trans-unit.target: Početni datum ne može biti prije današnjeg

trans-unit.source: The start date of the second promo month cannot be earlier than the end date of the first
trans-unit.target: Početni datum drugog promotivnog mjeseca ne može biti prije završetka prvog

trans-unit.source: The start date of the third promo month cannot be earlier than the end date of the second
trans-unit.target: Početni datum trećeg promotivnog mjeseca ne može biti prije završetka drugog

trans-unit.source: The start date for the third period must not be later than 30 days before the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Početni datum trećeg perioda mora biti unutar 30 dana od završetka reklamne kampanje

trans-unit.source: The start date for the period must not be later than 30 days before the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Početni datum perioda mora biti unutar 30 dana od završetka reklamne kampanje

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title cannot be longer than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov ponude ne može biti duži od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of vouchers issued per user cannot exceed the total number of vouchers for the offer
trans-unit.target: Maksimalan broj bonova izdatih po korisniku ne može biti veći od ukupnog broja bonova za ponudu

trans-unit.source: You cannot select a date earlier than today's
trans-unit.target: Ne možeš izabrati datum prije današnjeg

trans-unit.source: Тhe end date of your offer cannot be later than the end date of your advert
trans-unit.target: Završni datum tvoje ponude ne može biti poslije završnog datuma tvoje reklamne kampanje

trans-unit.source: The offer end date cannot be earlier than the start date
trans-unit.target: Završni datum ponude ne može biti prije početnog datuma

trans-unit.source: The voucher valid to date cannot be earlier than the offer end date
trans-unit.target: Krajnji važeći datum bona ne može biti prije završnog dana ponude

trans-unit.source: The email address is not in a valid format
You need to agree to getlokal's Terms of Use to create a user account
trans-unit.target: Moraš prihvatiti Uvjete korištenja aplikacije Getlokal da bi napravio nalog

trans-unit.source: Location is mandatory. Start typing the name of your location and select from the list.
trans-unit.target: Lokacija je obavezna. Počni kucati naziv lokacije i odaberi je sa liste

trans-unit.source: Password must be at least %min_length% characters
Password cannot be more than %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Lozinka ne može imati više od %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: Description must contain at least %min_length% characters
The description cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Opis ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov ponude mora imati najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: The Offer Title and Terms are mandatory for at least one of the two language versions.
trans-unit.target: Uvjeti i naslov ponude su obavezni za najmanje jednu od dvije jezičke verzije.

trans-unit.source: The Newsletter Title cannot be longer than %max_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov novosti ne može biti duži od %max_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: The Newsletter Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov novosti mora imati najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: Message must contain at least %min_length% characters
The message cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Poruka ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: This email and unsubscribed key do not match
trans-unit.target: Ovaj e-mail i ključ za odjavu se ne podudaraju

trans-unit.source: Video Title must contain at least %min_length% characters
trans-unit.target: Naslov video snimka mora imati najmanje %min_length% znakova

trans-unit.source: The video title cannot contain more than %max_length% characters.
trans-unit.target: Naslov video snimka ne može imati više od %max_length% znakova.

trans-unit.source: The email message was not sent successfully.
This username has already been registered by another user
trans-unit.target: Ovo korisničko ime koristi neko drugi

trans-unit.source: Тhe start date cannot be later than the end date of the event
trans-unit.target: Početni datum ne može biti nakon završnog datuma događanja

trans-unit.source: Please add location - city/town is required if venue not known!
trans-unit.target: Dodaj lokaciju - grad je neophodan ako mjesto nije poznato!

trans-unit.source: Please enter the characters from the picture below to confirm you like parties!
trans-unit.target: Unesi znakove sa slike ispod da potvrdiš da ti se sviđaju zabave!

trans-unit.source: Fields marked with a star are mandatory.
I declare that I am an authorized representative of the business.
trans-unit.target: Izjavljujem da sam ovlašteni predstavnik ove firme.

Declare that you are an authorized representative of the business.
trans-unit.target: Izjavite da ste ovlašteni predstavnik firme.
